price: 67 puis boiront par-dessus une eau portée à ébullition,
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: thumma inna lahum ʿalayhā lashawban min ḥamīmin
